summary: This document is a loan agreement between a borrower and Fifth Third Mortgage Company for a principal amount of $320,000. It outlines the terms of the loan, including interest rates, payment schedules, and borrower obligations. The document also includes provisions for late payments and defaults.

persons.name: Joann Brown
persons.context: Joann Brown is identified as the loan originator for the mortgage agreement with Fifth Third Mortgage Company.

persons.name: Stephen Ison
persons.context: Stephen Ison is mentioned as the Senior Vice President of Fifth Third Mortgage Company, involved in the execution of the loan agreement.

connections.description: Joann Brown is the loan originator employed by Fifth Third Mortgage Company.
Stephen Ison serves as a Senior Vice President at Fifth Third Mortgage Company.

locations: 435 S Tryon St Unit 700, Charlotte, NC 28202
keyFacts: The loan amount is $320,000 with a 3% annual interest rate.
Monthly payments are set at $2,209.86, starting on February 1, 2015.
The maturity date for the loan is January 1, 2030.
Late charges of 4% apply if payments are overdue by more than 15 days.
The document includes provisions for prepayment and borrower obligations in case of default.
